FuncDef: This command configures high scale (HS) aggregate rate limit of the SLA profile instance (SPI) associated with the subscriber in expanded SLA mode.The aggregate rate of the subscriber (the primary shaper) is configured in theconfig>subscr-mgmt>sub-profile>egress>hs-agg-rate-limitcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the HS egress aggregate rate limit. Values-1 to 100000000.
